data.name: Captain Carter
data.description: When Steve Rogers was injured before he could take the Super Soldier Serum, Agent Peggy Carter took his place, becoming a sentinel of liberty and healer of the Project Rebirth team.

starItems.name: Captain Carter
starItems.description: When Steve Rogers was injured before he could take the Super Soldier Serum, Agent Peggy Carter took his place, becoming a sentinel of liberty and healer of the Project Rebirth team.

1.description:

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Block Chance + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Block Chance for each <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> and <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, heal that character for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor and an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self and all <color=#fff568>REBIRTH</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> allies.
 > When this character or any <color=#fff568>OUT OF TIME</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for the first time, heal that character for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Armor and an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health for self.
